comment: If you are upset and frustrated , see this man s condition . How does he get his livelihood ? So do your things , with all determination and optimism . <URL>

# ::snt If you are upset and frustrated , see this man s condition . How does he get his livelihood ? So do your things , with all determination and optimism . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / see-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / condition
                  :poss (m2 / man
                        :mod (t / this)))
            :condition (a / and
                  :op1 (u / upset-01
                        :ARG1 y)
                  :op2 (f / frustrate-01
                        :ARG1 y)))
      :snt2 (g / get-01
            :ARG0 (h / he)
            :ARG1 (l / livelihood
                  :poss h)
            :manner (a2 / amr-unknown))
      :snt3 (d / do-02
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :poss y2)
            :manner (a3 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / determined-02
                        :ARG0 y2)
                  :op2 (o / optimism)
                  :mod (a4 / all))))
